td.a: LAST DAY OF SCHOOL- AWARDS PM

div.div:
Click the link below to download the annual school calendar.
Calendar 2019-2020.docx
​
​

p.span: There are a few updates before we launch our Continuous Learning on Monday, April 6th and continue until May 12th.

There will be pick-up times for items that have been left at school that are bagged up and waiting for you. These bags will include personal items, consumables, and login information for distance learning.

The pick-up times will be April 1st and 2nd between the hours of 1:00 P.M. and 7:00 P.M. Circle the parking lot as if you were picking up a car rider after school. You will then pick up your child’s bag on the south side of the main building. We will have signs posted to help with this process. Please remain in your vehicle and we will bring the items to you.

Your teachers will be in contact with you to help with login information and answer questions you might have. Each student’s login information will be in the bag sent home, as well as a resource list from Mrs. Thiel.
If you have a library book or basketball uniform, please return it when you pick up your items.
If you have any questions you may contact your teachers or myself.
Please be safe and remain healthy.

div.h2: Maple Families: please see important information below.

p.br:
Meals for Maple students:
Beginning Monday, March 23rd (M-F), all children 18 and under (19 if enrolled in school) will be offered a “grab and go” breakfast and lunch regardless of free/reduced eligibility.
Meals may be picked up curbside from 9:00 am - 11:00 am at:
*Etta Dale JH-east entrance of Lucus Hall building
*Roblyer-Northeast parking lot (teacher’s parking lot)
*Rose Witcher-main entrance
*Hillcrest-main entrance
Additionally, our food truck will deliver meals to the following areas of town:
*Holbrook Addition (behind Montana Mike’s-will drive through the entire addition) 9:00 to 9:25
*Townsend Addition (will include Kerry, Stone Glen, Homestead) 9:30-10:00
*Booker T. Washington (parking lot behind) 10:05-10:30
*Frank Knight Park 10:35-11:00
*Legion Park (City Pool) 11:05-11:30
If any student has a need for food and needs to pick it up at Maple School, please contact the school at 405-262-5647.
Listed below are some cancellations you need to be aware of:
•Maple Bingo Night
•Seiling Music Festival
•ORES Academic Competition
We continue to communicate closely with the Oklahoma State Dept. of Education as conditions change, and will keep our community informed.
Bill Derryberry, Superintendent

div.p: 904 S. Maple Road, Calumet OK 73014 | Phone 405-262-5647
